messageLogInBlocked.message: You are not allowed to log in.

messageLoggedInDemoUser.message: You have been logged in as a demo user.
messageLoggedInDemoUser.description: Message shown when you have logged in as a special user for demonstration purposes.

messageVerifyEmail.message: We’re sending you an email. Please open it and follow the link to verify your address.

messageVerifyEmailResend.message: We’ve sent you a new email.

messageEmailVerified.message: Your email address has been verified.

messageOrcidConnected.message: Your ORCID record has been connected.

messageOrcidDisconnected.message: Your ORCID record has been disconnected.

messageSlackConnected.message: Your Community Slack account has been connected.

messageSlackDisconnected.message: Your Community Slack account has been disconnected.
